availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Executive Journal, 1859-1862

body.p:
27
The Governor approved an account of $18. to John Haly as certified by the State Librarian
He respited for twelve months two Judgments of $60. each against Somerset Cooksey. by the Logan Criminal Court for tipling
He remitted the following Judgments, to wit:

row.cell: Mercer Cit. Ct. vs R. W Lowery --

body.p: He appointed Joshua Sperring Comr of Deeds for the State of Pennsylvania (Philadelphia)
Also Wm P. Mellen for Ohio. (Cincinnati")
He approved and Signed enrolled bill Chapter 177.
